remarks: Change the second bound variable in an operation abstraction. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 11-Jun-2010.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Dec-2016.)
statement:
cbvoprab2.1 $e |- F/ w ph $.
cbvoprab2.2 $e |- F/ y ps $.
cbvoprab2.3 $e |- ( y = w -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
cbvoprab2 $p |- { <. <. x , y >. , z >. | ph } = { <. <. x , w >. , z >. | ps } $.
$d w x y z $.
